RelatedSentence: A Prescott - based drywall company settled a federal investigation Monday by agreeing to pay $ 600,000 in overtime back wages and penalties in a dispute about how it classified and paid its workers .
A Prescott - based drywall company settled a federal investigation Monday by agreeing to pay $ 600,000 in overtime back wages and penalties in a dispute about how it classified and paid its workers .
